page.title: 18A Day In My Life
page.content: My name is Julie Tovey.In the morning I get up at quarter to eight ready for school.In the morning as soon as I wake up I go to the bathroom and have a wash,then I get dressed.After I get dressed I have my breakfast and then I go upstairs to clean my teeth and comb my hair.Then I put my coat on and walk to school.I pass lots of cars and buses and trees. I walk to school with my sister.I arrive at school about quarter to nine.I do work until half past nine,then I go to assembly.After that I go back to class and do more work until eleven o,clock.Then I have play. At twelve o,clock I have dinner.After dinner I do more work until home time at a quarter to four.
